segments.text: Julia , I would like to have a word with you . Have a seat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: According to your performance , I decided to give you a salary increase . From next month , there will be a 2,000 yuan raise to your salary . Although your first raise might not sound considerable , the company believes that with your ability , sooner or later you'll get a better raise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . Mr . George . As a newcomer , I understand that you have your consideration and I am satisfied with the raise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you again . I'll keep doing my best .
segments.speaker: S2
